original_text: And Moses went up unto God, and the Lord called unto him out of the mountain, saying, Thus shalt thou say to the house of Jacob, and tell the children of Israel;
korean_text: 모세가 하나님 앞에 올라가니 여호와께서 산에서 그를 불러 말씀하시되 너는 이같이 야곱의 집에 말하고 이스라엘 자손들에게 말하라

sentences.original_text: And Moses went up unto God,
and the Lord called unto him
Thus shalt thou say to the house of Jacob,
and tell the children of Israel;
